media:group.media:title: Share your funny outtakes + tag #MyBloopers
media:group.media:description:
Make your friends laugh on Shorts! Look through your drafts to share your outtakes or parody your favorite creators’ Shorts by tapping “use this sound.” Don’t forget to tag #MyBloopers for a chance to be featured in the Join The Moment playlist.


3 steps to create #MyBloopers:

👆 Tap create in the YouTube app

😂 Pick from your funniest drafts or record something new

🏷️ Add #MyBloopers in your title or caption + get others to join in


Learn more about Shorts:

https://www.youtube.com/creators/shorts/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9EJIH8kxTn8&t=8s

Shout out to @Mumuk & Eno, @Shiv Sewlal, @Wyatt Eiden, + @Nicholas Flannery for showing us how it’s done!
